definition: about a hundred/a hundred or so
Around the World in Eighty Days by Jules Verne 儒勒·凡爾納|儒勒·凡尔纳[Ru2 le4 · Fan2 er3 na4]
pinyin: Ba1 shi2 Tian1 Huan2 you2 Di4 qiu2

definition: The Yellow Emperor's Classic of Eighty-one Difficulties, medical text, c. 1st century AD
pinyin: Huang2 di4 Ba1 shi2 yi1 Nan4 jing1

sentences.english: The government brought two hundred eighty-five charges against him, mostly for murder.
sentences.chinese: 政府对他提出二百八十五费，主要用于谋杀。

sentences.english: China's love for towering skyscrapers just got turned upside down.
sentences.chinese: 中国对摩天大楼的热爱一百八十度大转弯。

sentences.english: Guillotine is a masterpiece of Aitmatov in 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 《断头台》是艾特玛托夫八十年代的力作。

sentences.english: Each Easter Eddie eats eighty Easter eggs.
sentences.chinese: 每个复活节艾迪都吃八十个复活蛋。

sentences.english: Up to 80 percent of the historic centers of German cities were destroyed by Allied bombs during the war.
sentences.chinese: 达百分之八十的德国城市的历史中心遭到联合轰炸。

sentences.english: And about eighty percent of exports are long-grain rice.
sentences.chinese: 约百分之八十，出口长期粮食大米。

sentences.english: Meat-textured fish protein concentrate (MT-FPC) is a new product developed in 1980's.
sentences.chinese: 畜肉状浓缩鱼蛋白是八十年代开发的一种新产品。

sentences.english: That comes to one hundred and eighty dollars. Will this be all?
sentences.chinese: 总共一百八十元。就是这些吗？

sentences.english: She clocked 11.6 seconds for the 80-metres hurdles.
sentences.chinese: 她八十米跨栏用了十一秒零点六的时间。

sentences.english: Unlike others, in the 1980s, authorities granted them certificates of ownership for both their property and the actual land as a rare gesture of conciliation.
sentences.chinese: 八十年代，政府发还了他们的房屋和土地产权证明。

sentences.english: My daughter learned the six new words in lesson 81 this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我女儿学习了第八十一课的六个新单词。

sentences.english: In old China,eighty per cent of the children received no formal education.
sentences.chinese: 在旧中国，百分之八十的儿童受不到正式教育。

sentences.english: Article 82 The Chinese language is the official language of the Arbitration Commission.
sentences.chinese: 第八十二条仲裁委员会以中文为正式语文。

sentences.english: The glass mountain stands at the corner of Thirteenth Street and Eighth Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃山矗立于第十三街和第八十大道的拐角处。

sentences.english: Then the king called in one hundred and eighty maids of honor and ordered Sun Wu to train them.
sentences.chinese: 于是吴王召来一百八十名宫女，命令孙武来训练她们。

sentences.english: But he also goes to sea actually in 85th days catches fish.
sentences.chinese: 而他却还在第八十五天出海捕鱼。

definition: more than ten/a dozen or more
